attributes.additional_details: It’s the right thing to do and will show the Great British Public that you care.
attributes.background:
This does not need many words. 

Tony Blair being awarded a Knight Hood is an absolute disgrace and a shows a complete lack of respect for the 179 brave British souls that paid the ultimate sacrifice whilst serving in Iraq whilst he was Prime Minister.   ALL FOR WHAT?

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
